title: Truth and Health
description: From a lecture given in Esslingen, Germany in 2000, the effects of truth upon the human organism are discussed — as are the relationships between vitality and truth, forms for expressing truth and the responsibility that one bears. Further discussion focuses upon thinking, growth forces and regeneration.
